hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cat << EOF > sshConnectionProductionJira.py import paramiko import select import time import re import sys import traceback import cnlsender import re import os import subprocess from subprocess import Popen, PIPE
server_ip=sys.argv[1] jira_source_path=sys.argv[2].split(',') jira_dest_path=sys.argv[3].split(',')
print (jira_source_path) print (jira_dest_path)
centos_username='centos' centos_password='' privateKey = paramiko.RSAKey.from_private_key_file("/home/centos/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem") # Functions definitions
def sendWait(command, timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.sendWait(channel, command, timeout, waitfor)
def sendWithoutWait(command): return cnlsender.sendWithoutWait(channel, command)
def justWait(timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.justWait(channel, timeout, waitfor)
#open SSH session to the server try: client = paramiko.SSHClient() client.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy()) client.connect(server_ip, port=22, username=centos_username,pkey=privateKey) transport = client.get_transport() channel = transport.open_session() channel.get_pty(term='xterm', width=80, height=24) channel.invoke_shell() except paramiko.ssh_exception.AuthenticationException: print "We had an authentication exception!" shell = None
#switch to root user justWait(20.0,"\$") sendWait("sudo -i",20.0)
#copy all files to the directory sendWait("cd /home/centos/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira") for source_path in jira_source_path: sendWait('jiraSourcePaths+="{} "'.format(source_path)) for dest_path in jira_dest_path: sendWait('jiraDestPaths+="{} "'.format(dest_path))
sendWait("jiraSourcePaths=(\${jiraSourcePaths})") sendWait("jiraDestPaths=(\${jiraDestPaths})") for i in range(len(jira_source_path)): sendWait('i="{}"'.format(i)) sendWait("echo ----cp \${jiraSourcePaths[\$i]} \${jiraDestPaths[\$i]}-------") sendWait("cp \${jiraSourcePaths[\$i]} \${jiraDestPaths[\$i]}")
sendWait("rm -rf $HOME/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira/*")
channel.close client.close sys.exit(0); EOF

cat << EOF > sshConnectionProductionJiraChecksumCheck.py import paramiko import select import time import re import sys import traceback import cnlsender import re import os import subprocess from subprocess import Popen, PIPE
server_ip=sys.argv[1] jira_source_checksum=sys.argv[2].split(',') jira_dest_path=sys.argv[3].split(',') AllMD5ChecksumPass="True" print (jira_source_checksum) print (jira_dest_path)
centos_username='centos' centos_password='' privateKey = paramiko.RSAKey.from_private_key_file("/home/centos/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem") # Functions definitions
def sendWait(command, timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.sendWait(channel, command, timeout, waitfor)
def sendWithoutWait(command): return cnlsender.sendWithoutWait(channel, command)
def justWait(timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.justWait(channel, timeout, waitfor)
#open SSH session to the server try: client = paramiko.SSHClient() client.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy()) client.connect(server_ip, port=22, username=centos_username,pkey=privateKey) transport = client.get_transport() channel = transport.open_session() channel.get_pty(term='xterm', width=80, height=24) channel.invoke_shell() except paramiko.ssh_exception.AuthenticationException: print "We had an authentication exception!" shell = None
#switch to root user justWait(20.0,"\$") sendWait("sudo -i",20.0)
#copy all files to the directory sendWait("cd /home/centos/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira") for dest_path in jira_dest_path: sendWait('jiraDestPaths+="{} "'.format(dest_path))
sendWait("jiraDestPaths=(\${jiraDestPaths})") print(AllMD5ChecksumPass) #preform a checksum for i in range(len(jira_source_checksum)): sendWait('i="{}"'.format(i)) remote_md5=sendWait("md5sum ${jiraDestPaths[$i]} | cut -d' ' -f1") #save only numbers and letters, remove all hidden characters remote_md5 = filter(str.isalnum,remote_md5) local_md5 = filter(str.isalnum,jira_source_checksum[i]) print("remote_md5") print(remote_md5) print("local_md5") print(local_md5[i]) #if the checksum failing even once, fail the build and not copying anything to jira if (local_md5 != remote_md5): AllMD5ChecksumPass="False"
print(AllMD5ChecksumPass) #all files Failed to pass MD5 Checksum test if (AllMD5ChecksumPass == "False"): channel.close client.close sys.exit(1)
channel.close client.close sys.exit(0); EOF

#show all files that modified in the current change server_ip="acjira" modifiedFiles=($(git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD)) #extract from first line in the modified file, the path of the file in test-acjira Server seperator="//PATH:"
jiraDestPath=$(cat ${modifiedFiles[0]} | head -1) jiraDestPath=$(echo "${jiraDestPath//$seperator/$''}") jiraDestPaths="$jiraDestPath/" sourcePath=$(echo ${modifiedFiles[0]} | awk -F/ '{print $NF}') jiraSourcePaths=$HOME/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira/${sourcePath} jiraDestPathForChecksum="$jiraDestPath/$sourcePath" scp -i $HOME/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem ${WORKSPACE}/${modifiedFiles[0]} centos@${server_ip}:"'$HOME/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira/${sourcePath}'" for filePath in ${modifiedFiles[@]:1} do jiraDestPath=$(cat ${filePath} | head -1) jiraDestPath=$(echo "${jiraDestPath//$seperator/$''}") jiraDestPaths+=",${jiraDestPath}/" sourcePath=$(echo ${filePath} | awk -F/ '{print $NF}') jiraSourcePaths+=",$HOME/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira/${sourcePath}" jiraDestPathForChecksum+=",$jiraDestPath/$sourcePath" scp -i $HOME/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem ${WORKSPACE}/${filePath} centos@${server_ip}:"'$HOME/tempFilesToCopyProductionJira/${sourcePath}'" done
#copy all files that modified from parent commit parentCommitID=$(git cat-file -p ${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION} | grep parent | cut -d' ' -f2) git checkout $parentCommitID #get list of all the checksum of the modified files sourceChecksum=$(md5sum ${modifiedFiles[0]} | cut -d' ' -f1) allSourceChecksum="$sourceChecksum" for filePath in ${modifiedFiles[@]:1} do sourceChecksum=$(md5sum ${filePath} | cut -d' ' -f1 | cut -c 1-32 ) allSourceChecksum+=",$sourceChecksum" done
echo "${allSourceChecksum}" echo "${jiraDestPathForChecksum}"
#make MD5 checksum test between the modified files in the parent commit to the files in Jira (check if before the changes the files didnt change) python2.7 sshConnectionProductionJiraChecksumCheck.py $server_ip ${allSourceChecksum} ${jiraDestPathForChecksum} checksumTest=$?
git checkout $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION #if all files passed MD5 Checksum TEST then copy all files if [[ "$checksumTest" == "0" ]] then python2.7 sshConnectionProductionJira.py $server_ip ${jiraSourcePaths} ${jiraDestPaths} fi
